string-array.name: qos_descriptions
string-array.item: QoS 2: exactly once (not supported by all brokers)

string-array.name: message_item_descriptions
string-array.item: conditionContent: Content of matching conditions. A message containing this element will only be sent if at least one condition is fulfilled.
batteryLevel: Battery level in percent. Can be -1 if value is unknown.
chargingState: Possible values: CHARGING, DISCHARGING, FULL, NOT_CHARGING, N/A
plugState: Possible values: AC, USB, WIRELESS, N/A
connectedWifi: The SSID of the network you are currently connected to. May be \"N/A\" if your device is not connected or the app is unable to determine the SSID.
geoLocation: The last known geo location of your device. It is encoded according to RFC 5870 with custom parameter \"timestamp\" which contains the age of the location in seconds since 1970–01–01.
currentTimestamp: The timestamp when this message was generated in seconds since 1970–01–01.
nextScheduledTimestamp: The timestamp when the next message is scheduled in seconds since 1970–01–01, or 0 if not scheduled (e.g. if currently no condition matches).
nextAlarmclockTimestamp: The timestamp to which the next alarm clock is set in seconds since 1970–01–01, or 0 if no alarm clock is set.
